import React, { useContext } from 'react' import JobContext from '../context/Jobs/jobsContext'; const AddJob = () => { const context = useContext(JobContext); const { addJobs } = context; const [jobDetails, setJobDetails] = useState ({ jobTitle: '', jobDescription: '', jobCompany: '', jobSalary: '' }); const handlesubmit = () => { } const handleChange = () => { setJobDetails({}) } return ( <>
) } export default AddJob
